motusTrack 0.1.0.9000
  • Reference

    Estimate location

    locate.Rd

    Calculate point estimates based on antenna bearing and signal strength.

    locate(
  data = NULL,
  ID = "tagDeployID",
  ts = "ts",
  sig = "sig",
  aLon = "recvDeployLon",
  aLat = "recvDeployLat",
  aBearing = "antBearing",
  det_range = 12,
  dtime = 2
)

    Arguments

    data

    A data.frame containing the telemetry data.

    ID

    Unique identifier for individuals or tag deployments.

    ts

    Timestamp column.

    sig

    Signal strength column.

    aLon

    Antenna longitude column.

    aLat

    Antenna latitude column.

    aBearing

    Antenna bearing column.

    det_range

    Assumed maximum detection range of antennas in kilometres.

    dtime

    Time interval in minutes for which point estimates are to be calculated.

    Value

    Returns a data.frame containing estimated coordinates and measurement errors for each time interval together with the proportions of time intervals w.

    Details

    • Estimate location for each detection: half of detection range along the directional beam.

    • Derive oscillating measurement error.

    • Weighted means (by signal strength) for each time interval.
